description: Add a new 4th tab to the Explorer sidebar that displays .coderef/ system files. The tab will show .coderef/ folder contents while hiding index.json by default to prevent file size errors (15MB file). This complements the existing Projects, CodeRef (user docs), and Favorites tabs.
goal: Enable users to access .coderef/ system files (context.md, doc_generation_data.json, diagrams/, exports/, reports/) through the Explorer UI without exposing the problematic 15MB index.json file.
requirements: Add new 'dotcoderef' view mode to ViewMode type definition
Add 4th tab button in ViewModeToggle component labeled '.coderef'
Whitelist .coderef/ directory in both local-access.ts and tree/route.ts to allow scanning hidden directory
Add filtering logic in FileTree.tsx to hide index.json when filterPath === '.coderef'
Wire up new tab in CodeRefExplorerWidget.tsx to map 'dotcoderef' view mode to filterPath='.coderef'
Maintain existing behavior for Projects, CodeRef, and Favorites tabs
Preserve 10MB file size protection for all file loading
constraints: Must not modify existing tab behaviors
Must maintain same rendering system (FileTree/FileTreeNode recursion)
index.json must be visible in Projects tab but hidden in .coderef tab
Must use existing filterTreeToFolder function (single string, not array)
All .coderef/ files except index.json should appear at depth 0 in the new tab
